AboutMe:
Professional Ember.js and JavaScript consultant. Full stack developer. Aspiring web engineer. I really enjoy working with open source technologies and on open source platforms (Linux) with open source tools.

If you would like to get my mentoring help, please visit: https://hackhands.com/kuzi/.

I enjoy writing Ember.js + node.js application as well as ASP.NET C#. I'm very positive about working and deploying on Linux platform. I took advantage of real life situations to gain knowledge. I've been learning through experience since I remember.
